statements: SELECT * FROM TicketSales;
SELECT event_name, ticket_price FROM TicketSales;
SELECT ticket_id, event_name, event_date FROM TicketSales WHERE ticket_price > 50;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM TicketSales WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM TicketSales ORDER BY event_date DESC, ticket_price ASC;
SELECT * FROM TicketSales WHERE event_name = 'Concert' ORDER BY event_date DESC, ticket_price ASC
SELECT ticket_id, event_name FROM TicketSales WHERE ticket_price > 50
SELECT event_name, ticket_price FROM TicketSales WHERE seating_arrangement = 'Front Row' AND event_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT event_name, COUNT(*) AS total_tickets_sold FROM TicketSales GROUP BY event_name HAVING total_tickets_sold > 100
SELECT DISTINCT event_name, seating_arrangement FROM TicketSales ORDER BY event_name ASC
SELECT * FROM SalesRecords ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT event_id, ticket_id FROM SalesRecords WHERE record_id = 10;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SalesRecords WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT SUM(price) FROM PricingInformation WHERE currency = 'USD';
SELECT event_id, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM PricingInformation GROUP BY event_id ORDER BY avg_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM SalesRecords WHERE sale_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT event_id, ticket_id, sale_date FROM SalesRecords ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT event_id, COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM SalesRecords GROUP BY event_id;
SELECT event_id, price, currency FROM PricingInformation WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT s.event_id, s.ticket_id, p.price, p.currency FROM SalesRecords s INNER JOIN PricingInformation p ON s.event_id = p.event_id;
SELECT * FROM TicketSales;
SELECT customer_name, total_price FROM TicketSales ORDER BY total_price DESC;
SELECT event_name, ticket_price, discount_percent FROM PricingInformation WHERE ticket_price > 50;
SELECT seat_number, section_name FROM SeatingArrangements WHERE row_number = 10;
SELECT customer_name, sales_date, total_price FROM TicketSales WHERE sales_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM TicketSales ORDER BY sales_date DESC, quantity ASC;
SELECT customer_name, total_price FROM TicketSales WHERE total_price > 100 ORDER BY total_price DESC;
SELECT event_name, ticket_price, discount_percent FROM PricingInformation WHERE discount_percent > 0.1;
SELECT * FROM SeatingArrangements WHERE section_name = 'Front' AND row_number < 10 ORDER BY seat_number ASC;
SELECT customer_name, sales_date, quantity * total_price AS total_sales FROM TicketSales ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT * FROM SalesRecord;
SELECT id, date, total_amount FROM SalesRecord ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT ticket_id, quantity FROM SalesRecord WHERE total_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM Ticket WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY seat_number ASC;
SELECT Event.name, Event.venue, Pricing.price FROM Event JOIN Pricing ON Event.id = Pricing.event_id;
SELECT * FROM SalesRecord WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT event_id, COUNT(*) FROM Ticket GROUP BY event_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 100
SELECT name, venue FROM Event WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-06-30'
SELECT id, category, price FROM Pricing WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT * FROM SalesRecord JOIN Ticket ON SalesRecord.ticket_id = Ticket.id
SELECT * FROM sales_records;
SELECT sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales_records ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM event_details WHERE event_location = 'New York';
SELECT seat_section, seat_row, seat_column FROM seating_arrangements WHERE seat_section = 'Main Hall' ORDER BY seat_row, seat_column;
SELECT ticket_id, customer_id, purchase_date FROM ticket_sales WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT * FROM event_details WHERE event_location = 'New York';
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM event_details ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_records WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT event_name, event_date, sale_amount FROM event_details JOIN sales_records ON event_details.event_id = sales_records.ticket_id;
SELECT event_name, ticket_price, discount_percentage FROM event_details JOIN pricing_information ON event_details.event_id = pricing_information.ticket_id;
